info.title: Pricing Procedure in Purchasing â€“ Read
info.description: The service contains pricing procedure, pricing procedure item data, condition type, and description entities. You can query each entity in this service to retrieve the corresponding business data.

x-sap-shortText: Read pricing procedures that are used in Purchasing using this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Reads descriptions of all condition types in the system.
get.description: Reads descriptions of all condition types for pricing in Purchasing in different languages.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads a specific condition type description.
get.description: Reads the description of a specific condition type for pricing in Purchasing, which the consumer specifies by passing "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, condition type, and language code.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads the condition type for a specific condition type description.
get.description: Reads the data of condition types for pricing in Purchasing for a specific condition type description. Consumers must pass "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, condition type, and language code.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads subtotal line descriptions in all pricing procedures.
get.description: Reads descriptions of subtotal lines of all pricing procedures used in Purchasing in different languages. Subtotal lines are the lines in a pricing procedure that are not specified with a condition type.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: PricingProcedure
parameters.description: Procedure (Pricing, Output Control, Acct. Det., Costing,...)

get.summary: Reads a specific subtotal line description in a specific pricing procedure.
get.description: Reads a specific subtotal line description in a specific pricing procedure in Purchasing, which the consumer specifies by passing "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, language, pricing procedure, pricing procedure step, and pricing procedure counter. Subtotal lines are the lines in a pricing procedure that are not specified with a condition type.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: PricingProcedure
parameters.description: Procedure (Pricing, Output Control, Acct. Det., Costing,...)

get.summary: Reads the pricing procedure for a specific subtotal line.
get.description: Reads the pricing procedure for the subtotal line description in a specific pricing procedure in Purchasing. The consumer must pass "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, language,  pricing procedure, pricing procedure step, and pricing procedure counter.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

get.summary: Reads a specific pricing procedure.

get.summary: Reads the pricing procedure item of a specific pricing procedure.
get.description: Reads pricing procedure item data from a specific pricing procedure in Purchasing, which the consumer specifies by passing "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, and a pricing procedure. Pricing procedure item data contains a list of condition types and subtotal lines ordered by a combination of step and counter numbers.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: PricingProcedure
parameters.description: Procedure (Pricing, Output Control, Acct. Det., Costing,...)

get.description: Reads pricing procedure description from a specific pricing procedure in Purchasing, which the consumer specifies by passing "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, and pricing procedure.

get.summary: Reads all pricing procedure items in the system.
get.description: Reads item data of all pricing procedures that are used in Purchasing. Pricing procedure item data contains a list of condition types and subtotal lines ordered by a combination of step and counter numbers.

parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Procedure (Pricing, Output Control, Acct. Det., Costing,...)

get.summary: Reads a specific pricing procedure item.
get.description: Reads data of a specific pricing procedure item in Purchasing, which the consumer specifies by passing "A" as condition usage, "M" as condition application, pricing procedure, pricing procedure step, and pricing procedure counter. A pricing procedure item can be a line for a condition type or a subtotal according to a combination of step and counter numbers.

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: PricingProcedure
parameters.description: Procedure (Pricing, Output Control, Acct. Det., Costing,...)

Subtotal lines are the lines in a pricing procedure that are not specified with a condition type.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

--request-separator--

{...}
--response-separator--

count.description: The number of entities in the collection. Available when using the [$inlinecount](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=67) query option.

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=66)

skip.name: $skip
